content: this pattern is now free as i m unable to offer support i hope you enjoy it this highly textured shawl was inspired by the many lichens and mosses that grow in wales lichen stitch is paired with moss stitch bands which are accentuated by reverse stocking stitch these contrast with the wide central garter stitch panel this makes an interesting yet easy knit for the advanced beginner a versatile shawl in 2 sizes that can be worked in a variety of yarns from fingering through to worsted weight it is best worked in a solid yarn to show the textured patterns well sizes medium approx 46 /117 cm x 20 / 51cm large approx 63 / 160 cm x 26 / 66 cm gauge 4 / 10 cm measured over lichen stitch pattern before blocking 26st - 29 sts / 37 - 38 row after blocking 20 - 22 sts / 36rows using 4mm needles and fingering weight materials & tools yarn fingering weight medium approx 400 - 425 yd 366 - 389 m large approx 840 - 870 yd 768 - 796 m needles 4mm / us #6 100cm / 40 circular needle or size for gauge notions 4 stitch markers blocking wires & pins skill level advanced beginner 2 /5 skills needed garter tab co instructions given working increases in pattern textured pattern including ws row the detailed instructions are fully written as well as charted throughout the pattern has been fully tech edited and tested i d love to see your progress / finished shawl over in the suseknits group 1 1 http //www ravelry com/groups/suseknits
